00160   Ny=param_m2.nmeas;
00161 
00162   //Memory allocation for the different variables
00163   deconv = (double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(double));
00164   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(deconv);
00165   xinc = (complex double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(complex double));
00166   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(xinc);

00170   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(y);

00174   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(noise);
00175   w = (double*)malloc((Nr) * sizeof(double));

00192   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++){
00193     xinc[i] = 0.0 + 0.0*I;

00197 
00198   for (i=0; i < img.ny; i++){
00199     for (j=0; j < img.nx; j++){
00200       xinc[i+j*param_m1.ny1] = img.pix[i+j*img.ny] + 0.0*I;

00202   }

00204   //Initialize griding matrix
00205   assert((start = clock())!=-1);
00206   purify_measurement_init_cft(&gmat, deconv, vis_test.u, vis_test.v, &param_m1);
00207   stop = clock();

00209   printf("Time initalization: %f \n\n", t);
00210   
00211   //Memory allocation for the fft
00212   i = Nx*param_m1.ofy*param_m1.ofx;
00213   fft_temp1 = (complex double*)malloc((i) * sizeof(complex double));

00215   fft_temp2 = (complex double*)malloc((i) * sizeof(complex double));
00216   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(fft_temp2);
00217 
00218   //FFT plan  
00219   planfwd = fftw_plan_dft_2d(param_m1.nx1*param_m1.ofx, param_m1.ny1*param_m1.ofy, 
00220               fft_temp1, fft_temp1, 
00221               FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
00222 
00223   planadj = fftw_plan_dft_2d(param_m1.nx1*param_m1.ofx, param_m1.ny1*param_m1.ofy, 
00224               fft_temp2, fft_temp2, 
00225               FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
00226 
00227 
00228   datafwd[0] = (void*)&param_m1;
00229   datafwd[1] = (void*)deconv;
00230   datafwd[2] = (void*)&gmat;

00232   datafwd[4] = (void*)fft_temp1;
00233 
00234   dataadj[0] = (void*)&param_m2;
00235   dataadj[1] = (void*)deconv;
00236   dataadj[2] = (void*)&gmat;
00237   dataadj[3] = (void*)&planadj;
00238   dataadj[4] = (void*)fft_temp2;
00239 
00240 
00241   printf("FFT plan done \n\n");

00245   purify_measurement_cftfwd((void*)y0, (void*)xinc, datafwd);
00246   stop = clock();
00247   t = (double) (stop-start)/CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00248   printf("Time forward operator: %f \n\n", t);
00249 
00250   
00251   //Noise realization
00252   //Input snr
00253   snr = 30.0;
00254   a = cblas_dznrm2(Ny, (void*)y0, 1);
00255   sigma = a*pow(10.0,-(snr/20.0))/sqrt(Ny);
00256 
00257     
00258   for (i=0; i < Ny; i++) {
00259       noise[i] = (sopt_ran_gasdev2(seedn) + sopt_ran_gasdev2(seedn)*I)*(sigma/sqrt(2));
00260       y[i] = y0[i] + noise[i];
00261   }
00262 
00263   //Rescaling the measurements
00264 
00265   aux4 = (double)Ny/(double)Nx;
00266 
00267   for (i=0; i < Ny; i++) {
00268     y[i] = y[i]/sqrt(aux4);
00269   }
00270 
00271   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00272     deconv[i] = deconv[i]/sqrt(aux4);
00273   }
00274   
00275   
00276   // Output image.
00277   img_copy.fov_x = 1.0 / 180.0 * PURIFY_PI;
00278   img_copy.fov_y = 1.0 / 180.0 * PURIFY_PI;
00279   img_copy.nx = param_m1.nx1;
00280   img_copy.ny = param_m1.ny1;
00281 
00282   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++){
00283     xoutc[i] = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00284   }
00285   
00286   //Dirty image
00287   purify_measurement_cftadj((void*)xoutc, (void*)y, dataadj);
00288 
00289   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00290     xout[i] = creal(xoutc[i]);
00291   }
00292 
00293   aux1 = purify_utils_maxarray(xout, Nx);
00294

00296

00310     param1.ndict = Nb;

00410     
00411   //Structure for the L1 solver      
00412   param4.verbose = 2;
00413   param4.max_iter = 300;
00414   param4.gamma = gamma*aux2;
00415   param4.rel_obj = 0.001;
00416   param4.epsilon = sqrt(Ny + 2*sqrt(Ny))*sigma/sqrt(aux4);
00417   param4.epsilon_tol = 0.01;

00428   #ifdef _OPENMP 
00429     start1 = omp_get_wtime();

00431     assert((start = clock())!=-1);
00432   #endif
00433   sopt_l1_sdmm((void*)xoutc, Nx,

00458         error[i] = creal(xoutc[i])-xout[i];
00459     }
00460     mse = cblas_dnrm2(Nx, error, 1);
00461     a = cblas_dnrm2(Nx, xout, 1);
00462     snr_out = 20.0*log10(a/mse);
00463     printf("SNR: %f dB\n\n", snr_out);

00477   cblas_zaxpy(Ny, (void*)&alpha, y, 1, y0, 1);

00606     assert((start = clock())!=-1);

00615

00617

00619    //SNR
00620     for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00621         error[i] = creal(xoutc[i])-xout[i];
00622     }
00623     mse = cblas_dnrm2(Nx, error, 1);
00624     a = cblas_dnrm2(Nx, xout, 1);
00625     snr_out = 20.0*log10(a/mse);
00626     printf("SNR: %f dB\n\n", snr_out);
00627
